sourcesContent:
import { useState, useMemo, useEffect } from "react" import { useOutletContext } from "react-router-dom" import { Plus, Home as HomeIcon, Calendar, Flame, Circle } from "lucide-react" import TaskModal from "../components/AddTask" const Dashboard = ({ tasks: propTasks, refreshTasks: propRefreshTasks, isLoading: propIsLoading }) => { // Try to get context first, then fall back to props const context = useOutletContext() || { tasks: [], refreshTasks: () => console.log('No refresh function available') } const { tasks: contextTasks = [], refreshTasks: contextRefreshTasks } = context // Use props if available, otherwise use context const tasks = propTasks || contextTasks const refreshTasks = propRefreshTasks || contextRefreshTasks const isLoading = propIsLoading || false console.log('🎯 Dashboard - Props tasks:', propTasks?.length || 0, 'Context tasks:', contextTasks.length, 'Using:', tasks.length) const [filter, setFilter] = useState("all") const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const [taskToEdit, setTaskToEdit] = useState(null) // Calculate stats const stats = useMemo(() => ({ total: tasks.length, lowPriority: tasks.filter(t => t.priority?.toLowerCase() === "low").length, mediumPriority: tasks.filter(t => t.priority?.toLowerCase() === "medium").length, highPriority: tasks.filter(t => t.priority?.toLowerCase() === "high").length, completed: tasks.filter(t => t.completed === true).length, }), [tasks]) // Filter tasks const filteredTasks = useMemo(() => { console.log('🔍 Filtering tasks - total:', tasks.length, 'filter:', filter) if (filter === "all") return tasks const filtered = tasks.filter(task => { switch (filter) { case "high": case "medium": case "low": return task.priority?.toLowerCase() === filter case "completed": return task.completed === true case "pending": return task.completed === false default: return true } }) console.log('✅ Filtered result:', filtered.length, 'tasks') return filtered }, [tasks, filter]) // Handle task operations const handleAddTask = () => { setTaskToEdit(null) setShowModal(true) } const handleEditTask = (task) => { setTaskToEdit(task) setShowModal(true) } const handleTaskSave = (savedTask) => { console.log('Task saved, calling refreshTasks...') refreshTasks() // Refresh the tasks list setShowModal(false) setTaskToEdit(null) } const handleCloseModal = () => { setShowModal(false) setTaskToEdit(null) } return (
{/* Header */}

Task Dashboard

Manage your tasks efficiently

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.total}
Total Tasks
{stats.completed}
Completed
{stats.highPriority}
High Priority
{stats.total - stats.completed}
Pending
{/* Filter Controls */}
{/* Tasks List */}

{filter === "all" ? "All Tasks" : `${filter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + filter.slice(1)} Tasks`} ({filteredTasks.length})

{filteredTasks.length === 0 ? (

No tasks found

Get started by adding your first task!

) : (
{filteredTasks.map((task) => (
handleEditTask(task)} >

{task.title}

{task.description}

{task.priority || 'low'} priority {task.completed ? 'Completed' : 'Pending'}
))}
)}
{/* Task Modal */}
) } export default Dashboard
